title: How to make a song become a global hit - Quora

response.answer_text: There is no surefire way, but you could try reading "The Manual" by "The KLF". Thrse chaps had a nr. 1 hit in the 90s and wrote a book on how they did it. It is rumored that some other bands dollowed their advice with sucess. Caveat emptor, it is not always to actual sucess in life. The other source of info I might get into is perhaps something on viral marketing. While I have not tried its principles Ryan Holiday's Confessions of a Media Manipulator seems to habe good insights.

There is only one person who could give you a proper answer to this question: May I present, Max Martin:  The only two people who managed to write more No.1 Hits than Mr. Martin are Paul McCartney (with 32 No.1 Hits) and John Lennon (with 26 No.1 Hits). So far Max Martin has written 22 No.1 hits but if you consider that he's currently in his prime I think it's safe to assume that he may have a good shot at superseding Paul McCartney in given time.
